body: I think this test should be optional. Our demangling is not guaranteed to work, it's a best effort thing. We could print a warning if it fails in this test, and have it as a smoke test.
body_html: I think this test should be optional. Our demangling is not guaranteed to work, it's a best effort thing. We could print a warning if it fails in this test, and have it as a smoke test.
